title: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge
creator_credit: Paul de Roubaix, Marcel Ichac, Robert Enrico, Films du Centaure and Filmartic
brief_description: A dramatisation of a short story by Ambrose Bierce set during the American Civil War in which a Confederate citizen stands on the scaffold, about to be hanged, and seems, as by a series of miracles, to escape death.
